titleStmt.title: Evangelion Aprakos (Gospel lectionary), fragment, archive No. A787a10:A-D, 15th c.
titleStmt.author: Dilyana Radoslavova

respStmt.name: Steensland, Lars
respStmt.resp: Trash and treasure. Russian Parchment Fragments in Swidish Archives

availability.p: The intellectual content of this file is copyrighted by the creators under the Creative Commons Attribution-No Derivative Works 3.0 under legislation in Bulgaria. In short, you could download and disseminate information, but you are not allowed to alter, transform, or build upon the works on this section of the site. All reuse or distribution of this work must contain somewhere a link back to the URL http://www.ilit.bas.bg/repertorium/

prefixDef.p: In the context of this project, private URIs with the prefix "bib" point to bibl elements in the project's bib.xml file.

support.material: Parchment of very fine quality. Ff.1r-2v and 2r-v (2 bifolia) both represents F-H, H-F sides sequences.

supportDesc.foliation: Ff. 1v-8v are signed in pencil as follows: 10:A, 10: B, 10: C, 10: D in the upper right-hand corner.
supportDesc.condition: It is a 4-leaf fragment composing to bifolia, as ff. 1 and 2 are detached. The parcment has retained much of its original light colour and the original size. Ff. 1r, 2v, 3r and 3v have served as document covers and are darker. There are number of stains.

physDesc.ink: Brownish for the main text, red and gold for the titles and the initials.

decoDesc.p: Intials В on f. 1r - 55 mm (5 lines) of heigh, almost outside the text column, В on f. 2r - 45mm of height, being outside the text column and discending in the lower margin, Р on f. 5v - 55 mm (5 lines) of heigh, outside the text column, and Р on ff. 8v - 55 mm (5 lines) of heigh, outside the text column, too. These are red covered with gold. The same technique is applied to the rubrics (titles) introducing the coresponding readings.

binding.p: Kept together with other parchment fragments (A787a)

item.quote:
Lille Savolax p anno 1618
Sigfrids Hindersons Opbördzlängds

Sigfred Henricksons Reckenskap
på Viborgz Lähn af Lille Sauolax för årh
1617, 618 och 619

msItemStruct.title: Изборно евангелие
msItemStruct.note: The text on ff. 1r-4v runs consequtively. There is another fragment from the same MS (A787a6) that folls inbetween these two bifolia. There is are missing folia between ff. 3 and 4.

sampleText.p: бити нас҃ . вѣм тѧ кто еси
и не въведи на с҃ въ искоушенїе,
еда подасть емоу скорпїю ; аще оубо

source.p: Directly catalogued from the original manuscript using the printed catalogue from ...

bibl.ref: Wesslén, Siw. Slavonic parchment fragments in Sweden. II. Gospels. A text edition with glossary. Stockholm, 1985 (=Acta Universitatis Stckholmiensis, Stockholm Slavic Studies, 17): 153-196.
